org.drip.analytics.rates

Class SmoothingCCIS

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.definition.CurveSpanConstructionInput
      • org.drip.analytics.definition.ShapePreservingCCIS
        • org.drip.analytics.rates.SmoothingCCIS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CurveConstructionInputSet

    public class SmoothingCCIS
extends ShapePreservingCCIS
    SmoothingCCIS enhances the Shape Preserving CCIS for smoothing customizations. It exposes the shape preserving discount curve and the smoothing curve stretch parameters.
